Class AuxDrawer2D.TriGrid

  • java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriGrid

        TriGrid(Panel panel,
        java.lang.String name,
        int length,
        int width,
        int depth,
        java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
        Creates a TriGrid drawer.

        Length and width of the drawer are expanded from the given length and width of the simulation.

        Parameters:
        panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
        name - the name of the drawer
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        depth - the depth of array (z direction)
        bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel

    • Method Detail

      • step

        public void step(sim.engine.SimState state)
        Steps the drawer to draw triangular grid.
